message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a price of $150. I believe it will be very beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $130? This offer reflects the true value of the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on a price of $120 for the product? I believe this would still reflect its value while staying within my financial limits.
